slide1.title: Clean Energy of Kazakhstan
slide1.content: Metan KZ — a next-generation CNG station network powering Kazakhstan with clean, safe fuel.

slide2.title: Smart Savings Every Mile
slide2.content: Methane costs less and helps your engine run longer and quieter. Real efficiency for real drivers.

slide3.title: Driving Toward a Greener Future
slide3.content: By choosing methane, you reduce CO₂ emissions and help protect Kazakhstan’s nature.

slide4.title: Metan KZ — Fuel Up Smarter
slide4.content: Nationwide network of eco-friendly CNG stations. Technology, safety, and sustainability combined.

VideoBlock.title: We are an innovative, eco-friendly company.
VideoBlock.description: We are rightfully considered to be the leading CNG company in Kazakhstan, driving clean and efficient energy for the future.

MissionBlock.title: Our core values
MissionBlock.description: Our mission is to lead Kazakhstan toward a cleaner, safer and more efficient energy future.

values.qualityDesc: Metan KZ ensures high quality at every stage: from CNG production to safe refueling across Kazakhstan.
values.safetyDesc: Safety is our top priority. All Metan KZ stations meet international standards, providing reliable and safe refueling for every driver.
values.comfortDesc: We make clean energy convenient and accessible, creating comfort and confidence for every customer across Kazakhstan. Our stations provide safe and fast refueling.

KnowForm.title: Want to know more? Ask us a question:

message.minLength: Message must be at least 10 characters

ServiceBlock.title: Our services
ServiceBlock.description: Metan KZ is a leading CNG company in Kazakhstan, providing modern, safe, and eco-friendly refueling solutions for vehicles across the country.

PortfolioSection.title: Explore our CNG projects across Kazakhstan

1.author: Erzhan Suleimenov
1.text: Metan KZ helped our logistics company switch to CNG without interrupting operations. Fuel costs dropped by 35%, and our fleet now runs cleaner and quieter. A truly professional partner in sustainable energy.

2.author: Ainur Kadyrova
2.text: We converted over 200 taxis with Metan KZ, and the results are fantastic. Drivers appreciate the safety and efficiency, while our customers value our eco-friendly approach. The best CNG network in Kazakhstan!

3.author: Sergey Petrov
3.text: The Metan KZ stations are modern, well-maintained, and easy to access. Our team regularly uses their maintenance services — everything is fast, safe, and meets international standards.

4.author: Dana Urazbayeva
4.text: We partnered with Metan KZ for a large-scale fleet conversion project. Their engineers are highly skilled, and the process was smooth from start to finish. Excellent service and great technical support.

ContactsSection.title: A quick way to discuss details

message.minLength: Message must be at least 10 characters

ContactsSection.consentText: I agree to receive communications from Metan KZ.

Footer.description: Metan KZ has been successfully operating in the Kazakhstan energy market since 2014. We are proud to provide reliable methane-based solutions and excellent service. Our mission is to set the highest standards in clean and efficient energy.

form.note: *Subscribe to our newsletter to receive communications and early updates from Metan KZ.

About.bannerDescription: Metan KZ has been providing clean and affordable fuel solutions across Kazakhstan since 2025. We are committed to offering reliable service, modern refueling stations, and comfort for every driver on the road.

Founder.quote:
Every day at MetanKZ, we make refueling in Kazakhstan cleaner, faster, and more reliable. Our mission is to provide energy that moves people forward — with care for comfort, safety, and the environment. We strive to make every trip begin with trust and end with confidence.

MetanKZ is more than just fuel. It’s attention to detail, modern service, and an honest attitude toward every customer. We are developing infrastructure and technology to ensure a sustainable future where energy serves both people and nature.

2014.title: 2014 Start
2014.text: In 2014, Metan was founded, starting work in the field of natural gas and compressed methane (CNG) technologies. This year marked the beginning of eco-friendly fuel development in Central Asia.

2015.title: 2015–2018 Growth
2015.text: The company focused on market analysis, design, and construction of the first CNG stations. The professional team was formed and the technological base established.

2019.title: 2019–2021 Opportunities
2019.text: Metan actively expanded operations, introducing new quality and safety standards. The company became a trusted partner for transport and logistics businesses.

2022.title: 2022 Development
2022.text: Metan launched new CNG stations and introduced automation and digital solutions to improve service and efficiency.

2023.title: 2023 Expansion
2023.text: Preparation began for the launch of Metan KZ, focusing on developing CNG infrastructure in Kazakhstan and selecting key station locations.

2024.title: 2024 Progress
2024.text: Throughout 2024, construction and testing of equipment took place, introducing energy-efficient and safe technologies.

2025.title: 2025 Present
2025.text: In 2025, Metan KZ officially began operating across Kazakhstan — a milestone toward a clean and sustainable energy future.

2025_expand.title: 2025 Future
2025_expand.text: After launch, Metan KZ expanded its network nationwide, integrating smart monitoring systems and energy-efficient equipment.

future.title: 2025+ Forward
future.text: Metan KZ aims to lead Central Asia’s clean-fuel industry, building sustainable, safe, and accessible energy for all.

AboutPartners.title: Our partners
AboutPartners.description: We are supported by 12+ industry bodies and media partners

Team.title: Our team
Team.description: People are at the heart of Metan KZ

Services.bannerDescription: If you are looking for a full-service CNG and gas infrastructure company, look to Metan KZ. We are doing our best to be a partner for all of your sustainable energy and fueling needs.

stations.title: Methane Stations
stations.description: Metan KZ is a modern network of methane fueling stations providing drivers with eco-friendly and cost-effective fuel. We operate under international safety and quality standards.

equipment.title: Gas Equipment
equipment.description: We offer a wide range of equipment: gas storage tanks, compressor units, refueling modules, and reducers. All equipment is certified and meets industrial standards.

installation.title: Installation & Service
installation.description: Metan KZ specialists perform installation, commissioning, and maintenance of gas equipment, ensuring reliable and safe operation.

delivery.title: Methane Delivery
delivery.description: Metan KZ supplies compressed (CNG) and liquefied methane (LNG) throughout Kazakhstan and Central Asia, providing full logistics and fueling services.

step1.title: Project analysis and calculation
step1.content: We inspect the site and determine the optimal technical solution.

step2.title: Contract and documentation
step2.content: We prepare the estimate, agree on conditions, and sign the contract.

step3.title: Equipment delivery and preparation
step3.content: We deliver the equipment and prepare the site for installation.

step4.title: Installation and commissioning
step4.content: We install the system and put the facility into operation.

OurBenefits.title: Our benefits
OurBenefits.description: Stable methane supply with fair pricing, modern infrastructure, and 24/7 support.
OurBenefits.stable_supply_desc: We provide a stable supply of certified methane according to KZ and UZ standards, ensuring quality and transparency at every stage.
OurBenefits.best_price_desc: The optimal methane price is ensured through our own infrastructure and well-organized, expanded regional logistics between Kazakhstan and Uzbekistan.
OurBenefits.support_desc: Our office in Samarkand operates without days off. We offer support, consultations, and prompt solutions to any issues at any time.

Contact.bannerDescription: Contact us for all your fuel needs. We always welcome any questions and comments.
